amendment.description: To establish a military-civilian medical surge program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3842 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3842 proposed by Senator Wicker for Senator Fischer to Amendment SA 3748. To establish a military-civilian medical surge program.
